name: GetRelatedEntitiesByTag
description:
Retrieve related users, teams, or escalation policies by tag.

Utilize this tool to get users, teams, or escalation policies that are associated with a specific tag. Tags are applied to filter these entities for better organization and management.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the resource (user, team, or escalation policy) to retrieve related entities by tag.

parameters.name: entity_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of entity related with the tag, such as users, teams, or escalation policies.

value_schema.description: Type of entity related with the tag

parameters.name: response_format_version
parameters.description: Specifies the API version for the request. This is set using the `Accept` header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the resource. Default and only valid value is 'application/json'.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return per page when retrieving entities by tag.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page.

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Offset to start pagination of search results, specifying where to begin.

value_schema.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

parameters.name: include_total_in_response
parameters.description: Set to true to include the total count of results in pagination responses. This may increase response time.

value_schema.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results per page.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

value_schema.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

parameters.name: total
parameters.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

value_schema.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.

parameters.description: Type of entity related with the tag

value_schema.description: Type of entity related with the tag
